title: Manage Profiles
connectedProfilesBody: You are able to have a maximum of {count} additional profiles added to your account.
youAreAble: You are able to have a maximum of {count} additional profiles added to your account. All profiles will use the main account email to sign in.
addProfileBody: Please fill in the following information for the person you would like to add.  They will be automatically added to your account.
removeProfile: Once deleted, you will not be able to add this profile to your account again in the future.
areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
emailValidError: Please enter a valid email address.
noProfilesRemaining: All available profiles are being used. If you'd like to create a new profile, an existing one must be removed.
removalNote: Note that only the account owner can remove profiles.
genericError: Please use a different email address. Questions? Contact info@gaia.com
name: Name
